rest in peace , my friend

The big problem is not the she used to be a "whore", the thing is, she STILL IS a maid in the family, and it doesnt look like she will refuse to have sex with other people than the mc(Hinata). She may like hinata more than the other guys, but I'm pretty sure that if someone from the family order her to have an orgy with 100 dudes, she will "gladly" do that without any remorse. I just dont know if she's a maid in the family because of her own family, or because she still want to stay this way.
Still, its not like Hinata is losing something here,  I mean, its very likely that he gets to marry Karen, who at least isn't banging other dudes, and he also get to fuck both Shion and her sister, Sakurako, so, not bad for him, even though the 2 maids are basically karen's family sex toys.
Since there's no such thing as dst in hentais, its all good, although it will be disgusting if he fucks her right after she gets fucked or creampied by other dude. So, if you "love" her, get ready to be cucked.
@zspecter Thanks for the explanation, nothing beats the pleasure of looking at the horny monkeys still liking a damn whore lol

Also, theres this one extra chapter(the one we see now). So, basically, both Sakurako and Shion are Karen's family maids, and Shion also has another master other than Karen, so, this means that she probably still fucking the other dude(shinjo), If you look at this cover https://nhentai.net/g/173145/2/ its pretty likely that she's fucking Shinji, and not Hinata. Shion is now calling Hinata master, wich means that he probably is gonna marry Karen, and that will make him also Shion's master. So, Shions is hot as fuck, but she's a maid, and if any other male of the family wants to fuck her, they can, and she will probably do it with no problem, so, whatever you want to call her a thot, whore or best girl, its up to you.

Since some people may be a little confused about the plot, and why there's a guy calling Shion a whore, I will explain(check the full manga https://nhentai.net/g/173145/ ). So, at first, we see our mc(Hinata), and his "girfriend?"Karen, and our maid Shion, Shion make Karen fuck the MC(Hinata) and then she fucks him, later on karen find Shion fucking Hinata again, basicaly its ntr for Karen. Next we have a chapter with someone who maybe is Karens brother, his name is Shinji, and in this chapter we see Shion's sister, Sakurako, we see Shinji fucking Sakurako, and later we see Shion doing lewd stuff with Shinji, Sakurako arrives and see then, and Shion makes Sakurako fuck Shinji in a more dominat way, she basically teaches Sakurako and thats its. Next we have a chapter with our first mc(Hinata) again, this time he was going to a date with Karen, but she didn't come, and instead he finds Shion, stuff happens and they fuck.

I need Shion servicing her master and young master more tbh
